name: Stuntman Water Park Wipeout
description:
Stuntman Water Park Wipeout, run and dodge challenging obstacles with a high jump like a real stuntman. Legendary stuntman running 3d requires your hero high jump skills to get the end line. Reach to the finish line by avoiding all the hurdles and performing insane stunts like a stunt hero. Amazing wipeout challenge game is designed in the water park. Do water stunts and cross impossible obstacles to become the wipeout challenge hero. Be the best theme park water runner and clear all the challenges in the amazing water run theme park adventure. Be quick and run fast because your little mistake will lead you to lose the mission of incredible stuntman run challenge.

Stuntman Water Park Wipeout Game has lots of challenging missions. Starting missions are easy and you can clear them easily. When you move to next the real challenge and difficulty will increase. Balance yourself on the challenging platforms and be aware of the different types of hurdles or you will smash badly.

Take the challenge and master water park hurdles. Do not crash with the wrecking ball, avoid obstacles by jumping, sweeping and running otherwise you will find yourself in the water.


How to play:
• Tap on a run button to move your stuntman forward
• Tap on a back button to move backward and stop while facing the obstacle
• Tap on a jump to jump over a hurdle
• Touch on sit button avoid any high obstacle coming towards you
Stuntman Water Park Wipeout Game Features:
• Smooth tap and swipe function to control stuntman.
• While a lot of exciting stunts tasks to complete.
• Orignal 3D visual and ultimate sound effects
• Responsive, excellent and Realistic Gameplay
• Amazing runs & jumping Animation in 3D.
